item.title: Notes: Factor Structure of the Adult Attitudes Toward Adult and Continuing Education Scale and its Capacity to Predict Participation Behavior: Evidence for Adoption of a Revised Scale
item.description: References Citekey: @blunt02factor Blunt A and Yang B (2002). “Factor Structure of the Adult Attitudes Toward Adult and Continuing Education Scale and its Capacityt O Predict Participation Behavior: Evidence for Adoption of a Revised Scale.” Adult Education Quarterly, 52(4), pp. 299-314. , http://aeq.sagepub.com/content/52/4/299.full.pdf+html, . Notes Briefly, this paper trim the widely used AACES from 22 items to 9 items and further checked the revised instrument’s validity and reliability and predictive strength.
